metadata.name: PwnDrp Access
metadata.comment: Detects downloads from PwnDrp web servers developed for red team testing and most likely also used for criminal activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND contains(lower(http_request.url), lower('/pwndrop/')))

output.summary: Detects downloads from PwnDrp web servers developed for red team testing and most likely also used for criminal activity

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ClientIP, http_request.url, http_request.user_agent False positive: Unknown Reference: https://breakdev.org/pwndrop/
